lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic would like to see tennis players at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics get ranking points from the ATP and WTA tours, the way they have at past Summer Games.
snippet: Novak Djokovic would like to see tennis players at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics get ranking points from the ATP and WTA tours, the way they have at past Summer Games....

headline.main: Djokovic Would Like to See Rankings Points Awarded in Rio
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Would Like to See Rankings Points Awarded in Rio
